holidays.title: Anniversary of the Memorandum of the Slovak Nation
holidays.description: The most important national movement of Slovakia established their national identity and eventual independence.

holidays.title: Daniel Boone Day
holidays.description: Today, in 1769, Daniel Boone was the first American to see the valleys and forests of Kentucky!

holidays.title: Dissolution of Union between Norway and Sweden
holidays.description: Learn about the Dissolution of Union between Norway and Sweden right here.

holidays.title: Eid-e-Ghorban
holidays.description: To all of our Muslim brothers and sisters around the world, a happy Eid-e-Ghorban.

holidays.title: International Supply Chain Professionals Day
holidays.description: E2open, together with supply chain professionals, are now ‘Moving as one.’

holidays.title: International Tabletop Day
holidays.description: We’re excited to go all-in for our favorite games!

holidays.title: June Bug Day
holidays.description: Switch on the porch light to attract a gathering of June bugs this June Bug Day.

holidays.title: Love Island Day
holidays.description: Let's get pumped for the new season of "Love Island" this Love Island Day.

holidays.title: National Black Bear Day
holidays.description: We've got all the information you need about America's black bear right here.

holidays.title: National Bubbly Day
holidays.description: Let your enthusiasm bubble over; celebrate National Bubbly Day our way!

holidays.title: National Chocolate Ice Cream Day
holidays.description: Channel your inner Willy Wonka and pay tribute to this decadently frosty treat.

holidays.title: National Prairie Day
holidays.description: National Prairie Day promotes the appreciation and conservation of America's native prairies.

holidays.title: National Trails Day
holidays.description: National Trails Day is not a trial but an awesome celebration of hiking!

holidays.title: National VCR Day
holidays.description: Do you remember VCRs? Today is the best time to relive this technological innovation.

holidays.title: Sette Giugno
holidays.description: Celebrate Sette Giugno Day by sipping a delightful cocktail while learning about Malta’s history.

holidays.title: The Big Lunch
holidays.description: Get ready to meet and make new friends, it's The Big Lunch.

holidays.title: World Caring Day
holidays.description: World Caring Day serves as a reminder that no act of caring is ever too small.

holidays.title: World Food Safety Day
holidays.description: Protecting our food, prioritizing our health, and living for a safer tomorrow.

holidays.title: Prince’s Birthday
holidays.description: Prince could play it all — and we're celebrating his artistic contributions.

holidays.title: Allen Iverson’s Birthday
holidays.description: This outstanding N.B.A. player has left a memorable mark on the game of basketball.

holidays.title: Charles Macintosh’s Birthday
holidays.description: Charles Rennie Mackintosh is considered an important figure in Scottish art and architecture.

holidays.title: Coco Quinn’s Birthday
holidays.description: This amazing young dancer, singer, model, social media personality, and actor is quite accomplished.

holidays.title: Fetty Wap’s Birthday
holidays.description: This exceptional rapper continues to wow us with his technique and impact on the music scene.

holidays.title: Hirohiko Araki’s Birthday
holidays.description: This artist made a name for himself by creating one of the world's most popular manga.

holidays.title: Lexi Rivera’s Birthday

holidays.title: Liam Neeson’s Birthday
holidays.description: This great actor continues to be a popular action star with his successful box-office hits.

holidays.title: Prince Vegeta’s Birthday
holidays.description: With a unique talent like his, this voice actor has established a strong presence on YouTube.
